title: Side by side: prejudice
creator_contributor_role: Agency for Instructional Television, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Prejudices
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Conduct of life
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Race discrimination
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Youth - Conduct of life
description: Friction occurs between two girlfriends - one white, the other Chinese - when the white girl's boyfriend does not invite the chinese girl to the exclusive Country Club because of her nationality. Raises issues surrounding the values of frienship, and irrational prejudices. No other credits available.
